column4: would there be any explanation as to why my wireless card would disappear after rebooting?
Did someone steal it?
lol
hehe
Sorry, just checking the obvious. lol
Seriously though, what do you mean by "dissappear"?
I'm pretty sure, the card is still there
the computer wont find it
ifconfig -a show anything?
I turn off the computer, let me boot it up
It is back :D
hmm, that is very odd.  Sounds almost like a driver bug or system bug of some sort.
the problem now is I need to make it work
next time try restarting it in the connection applet
hopefully there won't be a next time though p)
I'm trying to set up the card, but I have no luck.
oh, why not?
I don't know, I get all sort of weird msg.
Hmm, probably can't help you there then.  I'm no expert on wirless cards in linux
Noooooooooooooooooooooooo!!  I mean, no problem, thanks :D
I was hoping it would just be a module not loading, which I could help you with. :P
thanks.
